short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect and provide verbose warnings for embedded iframe elements in order to protect against Browser-In-The-Browser attacks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhanced iFrame Protection (EIP) is a lightweight extension to automatically detect and provide verbose warnings for embedded iframe elements in order to protect against Browser-In-The-Browser (BITB) attacks.
